developer.name: Nishan Bhurtel
developer.role: ML/AI Student | Full-Stack Developer | Data Science Enthusiast
developer.summary: Passionate about building AI/ML-powered applications and full-stack web solutions. Strong foundation in machine learning, data science, and modern web technologies.

projects.name: SmartLeaf
projects.subtitle: Plant Disease Detection using CNN
projects.description: An intelligent computer vision application that identifies plant diseases using Convolutional Neural Networks. Users can upload plant leaf images and receive disease classification with confidence scores and treatment recommendations.
projects.impact: Helps farmers and gardeners identify crop diseases early, reducing losses and improving yields.
projects.key_learning: Deep learning, computer vision, model optimization

projects.name: BreatheEasy
projects.subtitle: Air Pollution & Health Assistant App
projects.description: A comprehensive full-stack application that monitors real-time air quality data, provides health alerts, and offers personalized recommendations. Integrates weather APIs and health databases to help users make informed decisions.
features: Health alerts based on pollution levels
projects.impact: Helps users understand air quality impacts on health and take preventive measures.
projects.key_learning: Full-stack development, real-time data processing, API integration

projects.name: Student Management System
projects.subtitle: Full-Stack Web Application
projects.description: A robust student management platform for educational institutions. Features include student registration, grade tracking, attendance management, and analytics dashboard for administrators.
projects.impact: Streamlines student and academic data management for institutions.
projects.key_learning: Full-stack architecture, database design, user authentication, CRUD operations

projects.name: Movie Recommendation System
projects.subtitle: Sentiment Analysis + Machine Learning
projects.description: An intelligent recommendation engine that suggests movies based on user preferences, ratings, and sentiment analysis of reviews. Uses collaborative filtering and content-based filtering combined with NLP for review analysis.
projects.impact: Provides users with accurate movie recommendations based on their preferences and community feedback.
projects.key_learning: Recommendation algorithms, NLP, sentiment analysis, data preprocessing

projects.name: Smart Grocery AI
projects.subtitle: Hybrid Recommendation System
projects.description: An advanced grocery shopping assistant combining multiple recommendation strategies (collaborative filtering, content-based, and hybrid approaches). Personalizes shopping lists and suggests products based on user behavior and preferences.
projects.impact: Enhances shopping experience with intelligent recommendations and saves users time and money.
projects.key_learning: Hybrid recommendation systems, data analysis, user behavior modeling

experience.current_focus: Building ML/AI applications and expanding full-stack development skills
experience.learning_path: Advanced deep learning, NLP, cloud deployment, system design
